newsitem.title: JAPAN: Itochu to invest in Thai broadcasting venture.
newsitem.headline: Itochu to invest in Thai broadcasting venture.

text.p: Japanese trading house Itochu Corp said on Friday that it would join Thai conglomerate M Group to start satellite broadcasting in Asia in March 1998.

Itochu will invest 1.3 billion yen for a five percent stake in the M Group's venture called ABCN which will launch two broadcasting satellites in an orbit designated to Laos under international law, an Itochu spokesman said. The first satellite will be launched in December 1997 and the second in July 1998, he said. ABCN will be able to offer 150 channels and provide programmes to India, Thailand, South Korea, Taiwan and Hong Kong, he said.
